message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11500.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really benefit from this product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9800. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make another concession and sell the product to you for $10500. It's a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to you.
I really appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers. I'm thinking of $10300. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I like the direction we're heading, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again and sell the product to you for $10250. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be very happy with the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $10200. That's the lowest I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.

I understand you're trying to get as close to your target as possible, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $10150. It's a great price, and I think you'll be very happy with the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $10000. That's the absolute maximum I can pay, and I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.
